faqs.question: What are your business hours?
faqs.answer: Our office hours are Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM EST.

faqs.question: How can I reset my password?
faqs.answer: You can reset your password by clicking the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and following the instructions sent to your email.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Currently, we only ship within the United States. We are exploring options for international shipping in the future.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach our customer support team via email at test@gmail.com
